router_module_error_api_login_username_p: Maximum login attempts reached. Please try again later.
router_unknown_error_logging_in: Failed to login to router. Make sure the username and password are correct.
connection_error: Cannot connect to the router at {{url}}. Please make sure you are connected to the network. If the problem persists, make sure the router URL({{url}}) is correct in the app's settings.
invalid_router_url_error: Invalid router URL; {{url}}. Please set a valid URL in the app's options.
empty_router_url_error: Router URL is empty. Please set a valid URL in the app's options.
home_admin_only: Cannot view data usage while offline
sms_admin_only: You must have administrator access to view SMS messages.
sms_dialog_character_count: Number of characters in this message.
sms_dialog_character_count_max: The maximum number of characters per message.
sms_dialog_segment_help: SMS messages are split up into multiple segments of {{longmax}} characters if they exceed {{normalMax} characters.
sms_dialog_remaining_characters_in_segme: The number of characters remaining in this segment.
sms_dialog_message_count: The number of segments this message will be split up into. In most cases, you will be billed for each segment.
sms_mark_read_partial_error: Error: Could only mark {{successful}}/{{total}} message(s) as read
sms_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} message(s)?
sms_import_confirm: Are you sure you want to import {{count}} message(s) from the SIM card?
sms_import_warning_not_enough_space: There is only enough space to import {{available}} message(s) out of {{count}}. Would you like to import anyways?
sms_import_error_not_enough_space: Not enough space to import messages.
sms_import_complete: Imported {{success}} message(s) successfully. Failed to import {{fail}} message(s).
sms_save_not_enough_space: Not enough space to save message.
sms_box_full: Your message box is full. To receive new messages, delete some existing ones.
services_admin_only: You must be in administrator mode to access USSD services.
options_descriptions_general_defaultMode: The mode that is the default when you first open Quantum router
options_descriptions_general_rememberLog: Whether Quantum should save your login details
options_descriptions_sms_hideSimBoxes: Whether SIM boxes (inbox, sent and draft) should be shown
options_descriptions_sms_confirmDialogsT: Actions which will show confirmation dialogs before execution
options_descriptions_sms_typeIcons: The icons to use for different message types
settings_admin_only: You must be in administrator mode to change settings.
